name: Text Twist 3
description:
Text Twist 3 Word Game

The unique and most famous word game of all time is back!

Featuring:

• Over 1000 Different levels to play.
• Complete dictionaries and thousands of levels for English, German, Italian, Russian, Portuguese, Swedish, Spanish, Turkish, Dutch, and, French languages.
• Support levels containing 3-6 letters.
• Simple swipe and type system.
• Great interface with Tips support. Awesome Soundtrack.
• Easy to play. You can use your touch screen or a mouse to play the game. No need to type the letters.

Enjoy this brand-new version of the classic Text Twist 3 now!
